panels.description: current gpu clock throttle reason, 0 means no clock throttling happen. There are total 9 reasons, you need to change the value from DEC to BIN, and from low to high are reasons: IdleApplication LimitOver PowerChip Over TemperatureVR Over TemperatureHBM Over TemperatureThermal Over TemperaturePCCPower BrakeDIDTLow UsageOther. Or you may meet multiple reasons.
panels.title: Clock Throttling
